description: Try our easy to follow Apple & Date Spread Stack recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Desserts,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Back to school,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Jan Feb 2020,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple & Date Spread Stack Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place Medjool dates, coconut and 2 tbs hot water in a food processor and process to a paste.
Slice apple crossways into 5 slices. Spread each slice with 1 tsp date spread and reassemble. Remaining paste can be frozen for 1 month.
